basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, fruiting period July-August
basic.color: Flower color white, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or special humus soil
maintenance.sunlight: Grows in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
